text: "The Judas Kiss" is the fourth single off the album by rock band Metallica off their ninth studio album Death Magnetic. == Metallica's Discography of Death Magnetic == *"Cyanide" (2008) *"The Day That Never Comes" (2008) *"My Apocalypse" (2008) *"The Unforgiven III" (2008) *"That Was Just Your Life" (2008) Category:Rock songs
title: The Judas Kiss
